.. _apptainer_oci_attach:

apptainer oci attach
--------------------

Attach console to a running container process (root user only)

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  Attach will attach console to a running container process running within 
  container identified by container ID.

::

  apptainer oci attach <container_ID>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer oci attach mycontainer

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for attach

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer oci <apptainer_oci>` 	 - Manage OCI containers
